basics.name: Adrienne Kaneshiro
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawai'i. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2025.

work.summary: Facilitate conversation and provide English practice for foreign students
highlights: Encourage English language learning by utlizing worksheets
Gain experience and cross-cultural understanding with those from foreign countries

volunteer.summary: Assist workers + other volunteers in caring for cats at the shelter
highlights: Cooperating to tackle cleaning substantial amount of equipment

awards.title: UH Manoa Academic Merit Scholarship
awards.summary: A 4-year scholarship awarded to incoming freshman who have at least a 3.8 GPA upon applying to UH Manoa.

awards.title: First place
awards.summary: My team won first place in 2019. This was a statewide competition that tested participants' trivia and knowledge of Japanese culture, langauge, government, history, etc.
